results.content: A very good course to understand the data science core concepts concepts without having to go through coding. Super helpful for folks working with data scientists who want to empathise with them.
results.content_html: A very good course to understand the data science core concepts concepts without having to go through coding. Super helpful for folks working with data scientists who want to empathise with them.

results.content: I am very satisfied with the quality, pace and the delivery method of the tutorials/lectures. Indeed, I have learned new/practical aspects in data science.
results.content_html: I am very satisfied with the quality, pace and the delivery method of the tutorials/lectures. Indeed, I have learned new/practical aspects in data science.

results.content: As usual with Kirill, the course is very well organized, very professionally presented and lead through. This is the fifth course on the domain of data science, deep learning, machine learning, AI that I'm doing. This complements my knowledge like no other course will.
results.content_html: As usual with Kirill, the course is very well organized, very professionally presented and lead through. This is the fifth course on the domain of data science, deep learning, machine learning, AI that I'm doing. This complements my knowledge like no other course will.

results.content: @ Kirill, You are awesome man!! I did so many course designed by you just because your style of presenting topics with lots of examples. Tableau was my favorite though. I would suggest to keep length little short. Thanks!
results.content_html: @ Kirill, You are awesome man!! I did so many course designed by you just because your style of presenting topics with lots of examples. Tableau was my favorite though. I would suggest to keep length little short. Thanks!

results.content: I took the course on Tableau that SDS put out and LOVED it, so I was pretty excited for this course, but I was let down pretty heavily. I started off with the section about SQL, but I was quickly disappointed when I found out it is very difficult (if not impossible) to do on Mac. Now, it is not the SDS Team's fault that it does not work for Mac, but there was never any mention of this issue in the videos. I found comments from other people dating back 3 years expressing similar thoughts, but no changes have been made. In the section about building and analyzing models, there is a portion where you use Excel to analyze the model we built in Gretl. There are some Excel short-cuts used that were not explained, and it was VERY difficult to complete the tasks without knowing those short cuts. Again, comments from people dating back 3 years express similar ideas, but no actual changes have been made. The section on Tableau was good, but as mentioned previously I have already done the Tableau course, so I did not really learn anything new.

results.content: Very well done course.  Great explanations, good examples. It's a nice general overview of the process.  Plus, there are some things in this course, regarding process, that I haven't seen anywhere else.  If you are curious about Data Science, this is a great introduction!
results.content_html: Very well done course. Great explanations, good examples. It's a nice general overview of the process. Plus, there are some things in this course, regarding process, that I haven't seen anywhere else. If you are curious about Data Science, this is a great introduction!

results.content: Pretty impressive work along the way, the only thing I think it's a little stressful is the cleaning process, I thing we can use more sophisticated tools, like python scripts or similar and GitHub to track the changes of files :).  But so far, this is a good starting point for data science.  Great job.
results.content_html: Pretty impressive work along the way, the only thing I think it's a little stressful is the cleaning process, I thing we can use more sophisticated tools, like python scripts or similar and GitHub to track the changes of files :). But so far, this is a good starting point for data science. Great job.

results.content: Nice for beginners. If you want to learn - you will do some research by yourself
results.content_html: Nice for beginners. If you want to learn - you will do some research by yourself

results.content: I enjoyed the course until I reached the section for SQL. I have a mac and am having trouble installing and running microsoft sql server, even after downling docker and azure. Unfortunately it seems like I won't be able to complete the course without this. It is a shame there isn't an alternative or instructions for how to run it on a mac. Other than that, the course has been very good.

results.content: It is really helpfull and complex training. I will come back to lectures often. Thank you!
results.content_html: It is really helpfull and complex training. I will come back to lectures often. Thank you!

results.content: The addition of actual practical exercises to engage in after doing guided tutorials was extremely useful for me discovering gaps in what I thought I'd learned. It might be a long "intro course", but it's clearly quite necessary.
results.content_html: The addition of actual practical exercises to engage in after doing guided tutorials was extremely useful for me discovering gaps in what I thought I'd learned. It might be a long "intro course", but it's clearly quite necessary.

results.content:
This is very powerful for those who need to build a solid background in data science!
I extremely enjoyed learning this course. I strongly recommend it to other students!
